_official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for treatment of permanent partnerships between individuals of the same gender as marriage for purposes of determining entitlement to benefits under such title.
_short_title: Equity in Social Security Act of 2010

_official_title: To amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to protect rights of conscience with regard to requirements for coverage of specific items and services.
_short_title: Respect for Rights of Conscience Act of 2010
